name: Symcor
tagline: Canada’s largest outsourcers of financial process.
description:
Symcor is one of Canada’s leading providers of business processing and client communications management services, supporting major banks, insurance, retail, and telecommunications companies in Canada. Our business is dedicated to providing outsourced services and we are focused on being the best at what we do.
Symcor helps its clients stay competitive by providing cost-effective outsourcing solutions for their business processing needs, allowing our clients to invest in the growth of their core business. With strategic locations across Canada, Symcor believes in adding value to every client relationship through best-in-class service and the latest technology solutions. As one of Canada’s largest outsourcers of financial processing, Symcor offers a diverse portfolio of integrated solutions in payment processing, customer communications, document management, insurance services, and digital & analytics services.
